评论详情: Seen through

At 5’9” I purchased a different color in the small. They fit well, but came right at/above my ankles (which I hate), but I love the fit and style and can’t find that color anymore so I kept them. This color is the same style as my others, except I purchased a medium and it’s the perfect length. They’re not baggy even tho I went up a size because of the stretchiness and fit. They’re comfortable and I love that it’s a linen/cotton blend so they’re lightweight, but not see through. Great value! I Love the quality and style of Grace Karin clothes!

评论概述: Wish they came in smaller sizes
评论详情: Very beautiful thick fabric. I just wish they had XS or even smaller. I had to get mine tailored and remove a lot of fabric all the way down because it was way too baggy.

I returned these because though comfortable, they showed every single lump, every outline of shapewear. I couldn't see it until I looked at a pic of me trying them on; then, the lumpiness was crystal clear. They are very comfortable and would probably work better on a less lumpy body.
These pants must have been the designers comical view of what plus size means.  The pants were huge, and I mean HUGE with clownish style wide legs.  Never again.
Super cute, light-weight, stylish, and sophisticated but after two wears, the inner thigh section is already pilling so three stars given for sub-standard material.
These are really nice. Love the fit and length. Good quality material. Color is beautiful
My husband bought me these to wear to work. I work in the office. The material is a nice, thick material and fits flattering. They fit true to size and are very comfortable! Love them.

I love the color and material. What I didn’t like is there is so much extra material with the back pockets and it make it look wrinkly and baggy in back. The pockets come sewed shut so unless you really want back pockets it’s all frumpy and lines for no reason. I wish they didn’t bother with the back pockets so the back would be smoother. I’m going to attempt to cut out all the extra material but I shouldn’t have to.
I love these pants because they’re so comfortable but are a little baggy and make my hips look wider.
I love these pants! The green is so pretty. They are soft and so comfortable. I received many compliments!!

Super comfortable! I’m 5’2ish and they are a little long but everything usually is on me so to be expected. They are perfect for all year round Cali weather. Only “complaint” would be amount of factor in the mid section area but it’s not that bad. I suffer from fibromyalgia so it helps hide flair ups for me. Now value for money, it varies. I do think they are a little expensive for the type of material it is. Material quality is what made me give it 4 out of 5. Because it’s just forever21 type of quality. Which I found the same pants but cheaper there anyway and were exactly the same. But other than that, work great for whatever you needed it for.
Material was good. Pants are a nice quality but they run extremely large. I normally wear a large and could have ordered a small and been just fine.

I love these pants! Got them for a work event and I got so many compliments. They are really long though. I’m 5’4” and had them pulled up to about mid-torso. The length was perfect when paired with boots/heels. They’re very breathable too, the event was outdoors and I felt comfortable in high & low 70 degree weather with a mix of walking, sitting, & standing. I do recommend sizing down from your normal size. At the moment I’m between sizes 8 & 10, I needed to size down to a medium instead of a large so I wasn’t “swimming” in the pants. The fabric seems to pill in some areas so be mindful of that when caring for them. These are a new staple in my corporate wardrobe.
Pants are perfect for year round Florida weather.
Loved it so much I bought another.

I'm 5' and usually wear a size 2-4 and this fits me great, even with extra breathing room in case I have a big meal. I love wearing these to work and often times get complimented on it. They are a tad long, maybe 2-3in but I just wear platform shoes to even it out. Great pocket space too. I want to buy one in every color.
Es muy corto y la tela pica
I wear these to work- Super comfy
I can’t wear and beyond return window. Seriously huge!  Makes me look like an elephant.
Me encanta la tela, son cómodos y me quedaron perfectos. Size S

These fit really weird on me. Very high waisted but I had way to much fabric bunching between the waist and the crotch. Ended up being very unflattering without a tunic type shirt. The fabric is also not very high quality and rough.
Side seam ripped after less then a month

I loved these so much that I bought them in multiple colors. Fit TTS, and with some small heels, they aren't too long at all (I'm 5'2"). The lightweight pants are def more of a summer feel, but I'll still pair them with sweaters in the fall and winter.

I usually love the pants from Grace Karin and was really excited to try these linen pants. The fit was lackluster and the fabric quality just wasn't there. I immediately returned them. I will stick with my other options from them.

These linen blend pants are easy to wear with the elastic back and worked well for my tropical vacation. The quality however is very low. The fabric started to pill immediately upon the first wear and by 5 or 6 wears the pilling especially in the crotch was very obvious and unattractive. Also the green color is not the dark forest green as advertised. It’s more of a safe or army green.

These pants are fabulous! I got a large and they fit perfect, I love the elastic band in the back and the length was perfect. The only downside is the material makes them a little warm. I don’t recommend wearing them on a hot summer day if you’re going to be outside but other than that I 100% recommend!
True to size. Fashion forward style. Great quality Fabric.  Look great for a great price. I bought the black. Color is true black.  Very comfortable.
Everything ok.

These pants are really nice. I love the stretchy waist band. Amazon recommended a XXL for me (205lbs, 5’4”), but I decided to stick with my usual XL and I’m glad I did. The XL is still a little roomy. I’m not sure I’ll be able to wear shapewear with these without them falling off my behind. The material is much thinner than I expected, light penetrates it pretty easily. The part that bothers me most is the length. I haven’t measured the inseam to see if it’s accurate to what was advertised, but these are supposed to be long, and if I wear them at my true waist, they’re mighty short. I already have a short torso too, so I was confused by this. If I adjust them to sit as if they’re low-rise, it works okay. We’ll see how they hold up after the first wear.

评论用户: I am 5'3" about 135pounds. These fit great. I purchased them in three different colors.
评论详情: I am 5'3" and about 135 pounds. These fit very well. I purchased small in three colors. These will last a long time.
Cute pants, too short. I'm 5'6 and they barley touch the top of my feet.
So comfy and so cool in the Arizona heat. The only issue is they pilled after one wear

I was hoping that these cotton pants are lighter and flowy but they are quite thick and don’t have a whole lot of flow to them. They are also a bit long. I ordered black and tan. Ended up returning the tan and keeping the black simply because the black one was a little bit more flattering in this fabric.
Hard to iron and gets wrinkled fast.

Pants came rolled up in clear plastic packaging. Some sort of chemical residue had turned the inner packaging tacky.  I was hopeful that maybe the pants might be ok but no- they too were soaked in a strange chemical. Thankfully I didn’t even take the pants out of the packaging or else I would’ve been exposed to this possibly hazardous chemical. I also noticed the strong odor. I immediately washed my hands and put it in a big ziplock to contain it. The worst part is when I called Amazon to inform them, the response was for me to mail it back or take a photo. I asked why take a photo if it won’t show anything? You can barely see the moisture on the packaging, and I didn’t want to further expose myself by handling it further. I was hesitant to mail it back because when asked “Is anything hazardous in this package?” by the mail service, how can I honestly reply? It could be hazardous! It could be flammable! I don’t want that liability. I ended up taking photos of the pants in the package. It’s been a few days and still NO REPLY from Amazon. Extremely disappointing service considering how much I buy from Amazon. And I will NOT buy anything from GRACE KARIN again.
Feels like a halloween costume
Good fit and style

I purchased these pants to wear at a semi-formal event.  I had to wear a foot brace and no one knew I had it on because the pants were wide enough to disguise it!  The fit of the pant are flattering to my small waist 31" and big hips 44".  I ordered a size 14 and they fit just right since I like a little space around the waist  and I had a blouse that came down over the waist band.  The cotton ironed up nicely and looked sharp all night.

评论概述: Lots of compliments. Size 10. Got a large
评论详情: If you are kind of short and stocky these are really flattering. Almost too big but nice linen like material. Wide leg. Nice pleats. Pockets.
I wanted to like them. They feel so comfortable,  but looked clownishly large.
Fit as expected, comfortable, good quality fabric. It gave me this long legs look. Has not shrunk at least not yet. Love the business casual style.

评论概述: Cute and Nice Material, Sizing is Off
评论详情: Note: The person using this product in our household is my wife. I'm transposing her thoughts on the product for this review.  My wife ordered a pair of these cute wide leg pants and loves the material. But despite using the sizing chart and Amazon's recommended size (medium), the pants she received are massive and she'll be unable to wear them.  So, if you plan on ordering a pair, my wife recommends sizing down!
For reference: I'm 5'-1" tall, 135-140lbs, 39-33-39 Pants size: medium  Love these pants! High-waisted, lightweight pants perfect for office wear in the summer. I'm wearing 2" heels in the picture.

I am so glad that wide-leg pants are in. I like that the fabric is flowing and lightweight so that I can wear them at work during our triple-digit weather and not feel so miserable. Time will tell whether the fabric holds up, but I don't mind so much right now. We'll see if my review changes.  I had to size down from medium to a small with these pants. Like one reviewer mentioned, there's a lot of material at the front of the pants which could potentially be unflattering. However, sizing down helped. Additionally, I appreciate the elastic waist in the back in addition to the zipper/ button front. This will allow for some flexibility with weight changes during my midlife struggles. I do wonder if the zippers will hold up. They're okay for now, but I question their durability. For this price point, I can deal with it as long as these pants don't fall apart after only a few wears. I do love how it looks and the pant length. For reference, I'm 5'4", 140 lbs, apple-shaped, long torso, short legs.

The material of the pants was light and breathable. Color was spot on and exactly as I expected. Unfortunately the sizing based on the description was off and had to return as it did not fit me correctly at all.
Relaxed  fit , definitely could have gone down a size or even two particularly around the waist and thighs  . Comfortable material . 4 stars because material was extremely wrinkly . Not too long
Love these for work … so comfy and they have that vintage vibe, just what I wanted!
It's way more wide in the legs than advertised. Baggy in all the wrong places. The material is soft and the color is good, but the fit is abysmal. Not recommended for petite girls, even with heels.
Fit terribly. I am 5 foot 10 but they still were way too long.

I’m buying more!! They look great, I’ve gotten so many compliments. They are very light weight and breathable, have some stretch around the waist, and aren’t too wide legged. I don’t like the back pockets are sewn shut, but I took care of that myself! Totally worth the buy. 5’10 175lbs, wide hips, bought a size 10.
Just received. They fit nicely. I might update this review after the first wash.
I LOVE THEM !! i purchased a Large in pink will be purchasing more !

I am 5’8” and while I love these pants—they’re comfy, cute, and not too warm to wear on a hot summer day—they are definitely on the short side. If I wear them at my waist, the hem is a couple inches above the ankle. If I wear them lower, the front bunches out and looks a bit odd.  I still wear them, and I think they’re a great pant if you’re not on the taller side. They can be dressed up or down and wash up easy.
I was very happy, but the zipper came defective. I couldn't use it even once

评论概述: Nice cut & material but sizing is off
评论详情: The material is light weight and the cut is flattering. The sizing is off. I’m 5’8” tall and the length brushes the top of my feet. I’m 195lbs and carry my table muscle between my elbows and knees (thin lower legs and forearms). My hips are 48” waist 46”) Amazon suggested XXL and it was very large. I have to return and am trying to reorder a XL, but the price has jumped from $20 to $39. Looking for a different brand or will wait for a price drop. I hope this helps others with sizing.

Bought these in one color, liked them so much I bought it again in another color.  Nice fabric weight, great for a professional in an office. Colors are beautiful and rich, and have worn well.  Would, and have, recommend to others.
Not true to size. Medium is too big. Which is not common these days. Fabric is thick so not a summer wear. But would be great for fall.

评论概述: Hard to remove wrinkles, nice color, nice fit
评论详情: I was shocked when these nice slacks arrived in a tightly rolled bundle sealed in a plastic bag. I will have to have them done at a professional laundry to remove the wrinkles. Poor choice of packaging!! The slacks fit perfectly, a bit long. Thank to my mom I know how to hem them ❤️

Honestly, I liked the color, fit and feel of the pants. I love that they have functional pockets. They were comfortable to wear while working. But, after wearing for one day only, they are starting to pill and wear in the inner thighs. I think I have maybe an opportunity to wear these 3 or so times before there are holes in the thighs. Fantastic looking pants in my opinion, but be warned that they will not last for very long if your thighs happen to touch at all 😂

评论概述: Nice, but too wide in legs
评论详情: The fit is good, the material is nice, but the pant model is not meant for petite women (I`m 5`7", 127 lbs). These pants make smaller ladies look frumpy.
If you have thighs that touch then the material is gonna thin out super quick :/

I love the Abercrombie Sloan Tailored Linen pants but can NOT justify the price tag (almost $100!). I decided to turn to Amazon instead to see if I could find a similar fit with a more reasonable price. These are AMAZING! I’m 5’1, appx 190 lbs, size 12/14 jeans and these fit me beautifully. Even the length is manageable with a little bit of a platform shoe. I love the elastic in the waistband for more allowance (I can eat what I want and they won’t be too tight)! The material blend is also great for spring and summer outfits. I bought the “Light Grey” color and it’s more of a grey/beige mix, but I was simply looking for a neutral color and it met my standards. I will absolutely be buying a few more pairs!
Overly wide, frumpy looking unfortunately. Not made for short or petite girlie's. Will be returning.

These pants look well made, with medium weight cotton & linen fabric. I'm 5'3", 125 lbs, and pear-shaped. The waist on the medium size fits just right. The rest of the pants are too big and balloon out - not flattering. Back to the gray summer pants hunt...
Love these. Too big but doable
Perfect fit
Fit well. Good value and cute
First time buyer and I love them!! Looking to purchase more!! It’s a 10/10, in regards to, the quality, fit, comfort, and appearance !!!

These are very nice pants, but either the pair was sized wrong, or the size chart is off.  According to the chart, I needed a large for my waist size.  I knew they'd be too big in the hips, but I wasn't sure if the elastic in the back would offer enough stretch to make the smaller size comfortable.  But the waist on the pair I got was huge! I could have tucked a sweatshirt in and still had room.  So again, not sure if it's the chart or the particular pair of pants I received, but I have to return them.

评论概述: Color more tan-sand instead of gray
评论详情: The fabric is good. The color is not recognizable as light gray. The color is more the color of tan sand.

These pants are better than expected. They are flattering and fit perfectly. I am 5'4 and around 185 lbs and got a size large. Hopefully they wash up and fit as good as they do now. I would definitely recommend these.

Pants do not come out of the packaging ready to hop right into, but that's not an issue. The fabric feels nice and seems to be well made. They fit per the size chart. Will easily go from office to casual with the right pair of sandals. The only downside for me is that the legs seem to be wider than they appeared in the pictures, but that's not really a big deal. I'll adapt to that. I wish I could give 4 1/2 stars instead of 4 because overall I like them.

I'm not gonna lie...i don't have the same tiny backside i used to have. The thing is, the cut of these definitely makes your butt look pretty enormous. If that's your goal, these are your pants. From the front, they're slimming and the cut lies beautifully. The front pockets aren't boy deep, but they're respectable. The back pockets just seem to pooch out in a weird way, which adds an odd sort of lumpy look to your expanded butt. A little odd, but they're very comfy. I'll definitely wear them with longer sweaters, but not sure i'll wear them with the cropped sweater i had on yesterday.

I love these pants.  I am 225lbs and 5’4. I maybe could’ve gone down to a large but the XL works and what you see here.  There is elastic in the back. I guess I didn’t notice that.The material is a cotton linen blend.  They didn’t have wash instructions.  So I checked Google. (Gentle cycle cold or warm, no fabric softener, and air dry. If wrinkled you iron gently with something between the hot iron and the material).I purchased the grey and the pink purple.  They had a great price for natural material. I’ve washed them and can’t wait to wear them.  Yay!

I wish I could give these pants more than 5 stars!! They fit very well and are a nice length.  Even though they are described as wide legged, they don't feel like it.  They fit perfectly.  It is hard to find clothes online that fit they way I want but this hit the mark!!!
Fällt wirklich riesig aus, Fäden hängen heraus

While the pants are of decent quality materials and are elegant and comfortable, I have ordered size Medium, my usual size, yet these pants, even for palazzo, are too large on me ( I am 175 cm and 70 kg). Will not return, too lazy, but sure would prefer Small by this manufacturer.
